Package org.miniauth.exception

Package for various exception types.

See: Description

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AuthSignatureException
    Exception while generating OAuth signatures.
    BadRequestException
    Input error.
    InternalErrorException
    Any generic exception.
    InvalidCredentialException
    Auth error.
    InvalidInputException
    Invalid request input exception.
    InvalidStateException
    Similar to IlligalStateException except that this inherits from MiniAuthException.
    UnauthorizedException
    Auth error.
    ValidationException
    Data format error, etc.

Package org.miniauth.exception Description

Package for various exception types. All exceptions in MiniAuth inherit from MiniAuthException.
